FaqDATA.ques: What are the modules covered under Skillslash’s Blockchain course in Bangalore?
FaqDATA.ans: In this extensive Blockchain course in Gurugram, you will learn about blockchain and its importance. Further covering - block chain transaction process, bitcoin blockchain, hyper ledger etc.  Besides, you will get blockchain programming training covering the fundamentals of JavaScript, HTML, CSS and Linux.

FaqDATA.ques: What are the key skills that this Blockchain course in Gurugram focus on?
FaqDATA.ans: The blockchain course with placement in Gurugram gives emphasis to boosting the skillset in Bitcoin. Particularly, block chain technology. In addition, you will get an opportunity to skill up in multichain block chain platforms, Ethereum and Hyperledger. Furthermore, you will be trained on how to use tools like Meta Mask and Truffle under this blockchain course.

FaqDATA.ques: What is the blockchain course fees in Gurugram and its duration at Skillslash?
FaqDATA.ans: Skillslash’s Blockchain course duration is 6 months and blockchain course fees in Gurugram starts from INR 59,000. Besides, you can additionally avail a scholarship under our block chain certification program. That said, a 10% scholarship has relevancy just in case you are displaying excellence within the aptitude exam. So, if a candidate scores about sixty-five percentage in the exam, she or he gets an eligibility for a 30-percentage discount on the blockchain course fees.

FaqDATA.ques: If I am forced to omit a class due to an emergency, will there be a makeup class available?
FaqDATA.ans: Firstly, we offer direct on-line classes. Besides, all of our students get video recordings of these classes. Furthermore, we offer you with unrestricted access to the recorded sessions. So, you can use them whenever you would like theoretical help. So, just in case you omit any of the classes, you need not be disappointed. That said, we do, however, strongly inspire you to attend the classes regularly.

FaqDATA.ques: How many projects are included in this Blockchain course in Gurugram?
FaqDATA.ans: Skillslash’s blockchain course is extensive and designed giving emphasis to industry training. Which means, you get to participate in about 15+ live blockchain projects and learn exactly what is blockchain technology. Besides, we offer you live projects under our blockchain course with placement in Gurugram.  Particularly, this covers - Hyperledger, Ethereum, Multichain, and Bitcoin. Also, you can avail direct project certifications from top startups.

FaqDATA.ques: What kind of certification does Blockchain course in Gurugram provide?
FaqDATA.ans: Most importantly, you won’t receive any ordinary sort of certification or diploma under our Blockchain course in Gurugram. Instead, we offer valuable project experience certificates this is globally regarded. Besides, direct certifications also are available from the corporate with which you completed your industrial projects.
